entry.title: Shiba Inu Team Debuts Card Payments For BONE Meme Coin On Shibarium
entry.summary:
The Shiba Inu team is celebrating yet another milestone as they add a new payment method on the Shibarium network. This time around, the team is celebrating the addition of card payments for BONE transactions on the Ethereum Layer 2 network, making it one step easier for investors to be onboarded into the budding Shiba Inu community.
Buying BONE Tokens With Credit Cards
In an X (formerly Twitter) post, Shiba Inu marketing lead, LUCIE, revealed a major development for the Shibarium ecosystem. According to the post, investors who wish to invest in BONE, the utility token for the Shibarium Layer 2 network, can now buy the coin directly using their cards.
This development means that users of the Shibarium network will no longer have to go through the arduous process of bridging in orde‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bitfinex Partners with Komainu for Digital Asset Custody Solutions
entry.summary: Bitfinex has announced plans to integrate Komainu Connect, a regulated digital asset custodian. This collaboration aims to enable institutions and investors to trade on Bitfinex's deep liquidity platform while ensuring their assets are held in a regulated custody environment. Supported by Ledger Tradelink According to Bitfinex, this partnership is made possible by Ledger Enterprise's off-exchange trading and settlement technology, Ledger Tradelink. This technology will allow Bitfinex's institutional customers to trade without frequently moving assets on-chain. By integrating with Komainu Connect, Bitfinex has promised users access to the liquid crypto markets while their assets remain stored with Komainu, a regulated custodian. entry.title: Ecuador Doubles Down On Crypto Ban Following Worldcoin Controversy
entry.summary:
Worldcoin (WLD), a crypto project co-founded by OpenAI‚Äôs CEO Sam Altman, arrived in Ecuador in June. Due to its growing popularity, Ecuadorian authorities have warned its citizens about the project.
Most recently, Ecuador‚Äôs Central Bank (ECB) issued a press release reiterating the country‚Äôs stance on cryptocurrencies and reminding users of the risks involving the illegal use of digital assets as a payment method.
Worldcoin Faces More Controversy
In June, Worldcoin announced that its World ID verifications would be coming to Ecuador at the end of the month. Starting June 26, the verifications have been available at six locations across Quito and Guayaquil.

entry.title: Mog: The 4Chan Meme Now Worth $800 MILLION
entry.summary: Mogging started on 4Chan back in 2016 as a slang term to dominate another person. But now, eight years later, mog has redefined itself through an Ethereum meme coin. Crypto traders Aug and Slumpt often joked that they‚Äôd launch a cryptocurrency around the mogging meme but never really pulled through. That was until Aug decided to press the button.

entry.title: Fomo Hour 171 - The Bitcoin Bounce
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +51m, ETH ETFs: +$26m. BTC bounces at $62k amid $300m liquidations. BTC volatility hits 2 month high. SOL flips ETH monthly DEX volume. SOL rumour claims insiders own 8%. Coinbase shares rise 2% after strong earnings. Marathon Digital falls 8% after revenue miss. Bybit exits France over regulation. Crypto(.)com surpasses Coinbase volume. Do Kwon will be extradited to South Korea. CVG falls 99% after exploit. JUP votes to reduce 30% team supply.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 170 - BITCOIN FALLS BELOW 65K
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +0m, ETH ETFs: -$77m. Crypto falls after Fed, Trump speech & Iran threats. Mt. Gox still has $2.1bn BTC after distributions. Lummis introduces bill to buy 1m BTC. Large BTC holders bought $5.4bn in July. Tether makes $1.3bn profit in Q2. DeFi loans hit 2022 levels. Base sees 80% of active Uniswap traders. $900m of altcoin unlocks this month. Elixir launches deUSD as rival to Ethena.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 169 - NEIRO HITS $100M!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$18m, ETH ETFs: +$34m. Mt. Gox move another $3bn BTC, prices stable. ETH ETFs see net inflow as Grayscale outflow slows. BTC exchange reserves hit multi-year low. XRP up 7% ahead of potential SEC settlement. UAE banks integrate crypto trading. Bybit integrates USDe with up to 20% yield. California DMV puts 42m car titles on AVAX. BTC mining to be a $20bn industry: Bernstein. Russia legalises various crypto activities. Terra blockchain halted, Astro faces $6.8m exploit. Trump raised $21m at BTC conference.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 168 - SEC DROPS SOL CLAIMS
entry.summary: BTC falls to $66k after government moves $2bn BTC. Transfer most likely just a new custodian. SEC plans to drop charges SOL is a security. SOL ETF not happening in near term: BlackRock. ETFs to hit model portfolios later this year: BlackRock. Grayscale ETH ETF outflows slow marginally. Tron surpasses ETH & SOL for 24hr revenue. Pump(.)fun revenue beats ETH. BTC future tied to the elections: Jeffries. Polymarket hits $1bn betting volume. Polymarket integrates with Substack. Binance Labs announce 7th season of incubations. There is merit to Bitcoin and other coins: Elon. DeFi coins rise as MKR votes to share fees. COMP agrees to share fees with token holders.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 167 - CHATTING TO DOODLES!
entry.summary: BTC nears $70k after Trump speech, PoW alts soar. Crypto funds saw $245m inflows last week. Open Interest on BTC hits record $39.4bn. SOL overtakes ETH in several key metrics. Pump(.)fun overtakes ETH for daily revenue. Jito overtakes Lido for fees collected. $1.5bn altcoin unlocks in August, $600m XRP. Compound DAO faces $25m governance attack. entry.title: New Technology Is Making Bionic Limbs More Affordable
entry.summary: Alt Bionics founder and CEO Ryan Saavedra talks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about the Genesis Hand, an affordable $5,000 bionic limb designed for daily use.

entry.title: The Story of Solana Meme Coin Billy
entry.summary: Billy is the largest Solana meme coin on Pumpdotfun, peaking at a market cap of over $200 million. But it wasn‚Äôt always smooth sailing. Minutes after launching Billy‚Äôs dev abandoned him and sold the majority of their tokens. At the time, the tokens were worth $1,116 but at today‚Äôs value they‚Äôd be worth more than $8.65 million.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 166 - CRYPTO AND STOCKS FALL
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$44m, ETH ETFs: -$133m. ETH falls as Grayscale ETF outflows continue. ETH ETFs still see $1bn of daily volume. Liquidations hit $250m in sell-off. ETH Open Interest hits ATH at CME. BTC whales have bought $23bn in July. SOL weekly active addresses hits ATH. Bitstamp to distribute Mt. Gox BTC today. Russia to legalise crypto mining & payments. Lummis set to introduce BTC strategic reserve bill. Harris will not be at Bitcoin Nashville. BTC going to $52m by 2050: VanEck. Hashdex file for mixed BTC & ETH ETF. Riot buys another miner for $93m.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 165 - ETH ETFs TAKE IN 107M
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$78m, ETH ETFs: +$107m. BTC falls amid ETF outflows & Mt. Gox movements. ETH ETFs see ‚Äòvery solid‚Äô first day $107m inflows. Grayscale ETH trust sees $484m outflow. ETH ETF volumes come out at 23% of BTC. Debate about whether strong flows will continue. SOL DEX volume continues to rise above ETH. Harris may also speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Harris could be far more open to Bitcoin: Cuban. BTC symbol lights up Vegas Sphere.
